name: Little knight helps out
description:
Hey, this is a game I've created for my University project. You take on the role of a little knight helping around his town, it's still under development at the moment, though updates will be posted.

Controls:

  • Mouse - Look left and right (Player moves in the direction you're facing)
  • Left Click - Attack/Interact
  • W - Move forwards
  • S - Move backwards
  • Left Shift - Sprint
